```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Do this every time you make a major change
```{r loading}
library(devtools)
library(quarto)
```

```{r updateMetaData}
load_all()
document()
```

```{r updateDocumentation}
quarto::quarto_render('README.qmd')
```

```{r checking}
# Ensure there are no errors
devtools::check()
```

```{r building}
# Build the package
devtools::build()
```

```{r installing}
# install the package and build the vignette
devtools::install(build_vignettes = TRUE, upgrade = 'never')
```

```{r viewVignette}
# view the vignettes
# browseVignettes("styles.cmac")
```
